code: import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SignIn(){const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const formData=new FormData();formData.append("username",username);formData.append("password",password);try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:8080/auth/register',{method:'POST',contentType:'multipart/form-data',body:formData});const data=await response.json();if(response.status===201){setMessage('Inicio de sesión exitoso');}else{setMessage(data.message||'Error al iniciar sesión');}}catch(error){setMessage('Error de conexión con la API.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sigin-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"logo.png",alt:"Logo",className:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Direcci\xF3n de Correo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"username",type:"username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Contrase\xF1a"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"password",type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Crear cuenta"}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"message",children:message})]})]});}export default SignIn;
